Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix: Add write_orders scope to save metafields

Changed from read_orders to write_orders scope to allow
the webhook to save ticket QR codes in order metafields.

This is required for the orderUpdate mutation to work.

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Debug: Add detailed error logging for metafield save failures

Added parsing of Response error objects to see the exact error
message from Shopify when metafield save fails with 401.

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add endpoint to clear sessions and force token regeneration

Created /api/clear-sessions endpoint to delete all sessions,
forcing Shopify to generate new tokens with updated scopes.

This fixes the 401 error when saving metafields - old tokens
don''t have write_orders scope even after reinstalling the app.

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
